document_data.name: Deena
document_data.mainbody: '''Deena''' was a [[dryad]] who lived in the [[Hullack Forest]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: She was accompanied by four [[treant]]s that she called her "big brothers". She was looking for a romantic partner, even if it meant ''[[Charm|charming]]'' a stranger and keeping them as a slave.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Deena witnessed the logging and mining operations of the [[fire giant]] [[Oghalis]], and her [[hobgoblin]] followers led by Chief [[Gugak Thul]]. When adventurers from [[Thunderstone]] appeared to track down the hobgoblins, she pointed them in the right direction, though she may have attempted to seduce an attractive male of the group.
